title: How to Check Your Roaming Data Usage on an iPhone

steps.title: Look at the "Current Period Roaming" number.
steps.content: Look at the "Current Period Roaming" number. This is the amount of roaming data you've used in your current data cycle.

steps.title: Tap the Voice Roaming switch.
steps.content: Tap the Voice Roaming switch. Voice Roaming allows you to use data for phone calls while away from your home network. Using Voice Roaming may result in fees.

steps.title: Tap the Data Roaming switch.
steps.content: Tap the Data Roaming switch. This will apply the Voice Roaming concept to your messaging as well. You can incur SMS fees while using this feature.

steps.title: Tap the International CDMA switch.
steps.content: Tap the International CDMA switch. CDMA provides coverage in areas of the world where your service provider has an agreement with CDMA carriers in the region. [1] X Research source Turning this on may result in fees.
